lines.text:
[taunting]
Yooh whoo. It's me.
Tis he. After he.
After who?
After him.
After you.
But then, you've always had magnificent balls, and I wouldn't miss one of them.
Thank you Lady Binder.
Come here, you little vixen!
Oh, get off! Stop it!
[the Black Fingernail has rescued a French aristocrat, the Duc de Pommfrit, from the guillotine and left his calling card there]
So, Citizen Head of Secret Police Camembert, the one who calls himself "The Black Fingernail" has fooled you again.
Oh, I wouldn't say that, citizen.
Oh, you wouldn't?
No.

[Waves paper with Black Fingernail's sign on it]
This is his calling card. It was found on the guillotine after that disgraceful exhibition this afternoon.
Yes, that's true, but he didn't fool me. Oh no, not for one moment.

[Sarcastically]
He didn't? Oh, perhaps I've got the story wrong. This time he posed as an insurance salesman, correct?
Yes.
Abducted the Duc de Pommfrit from under your very nose?
Yes.
And tricked you into executing your own executioner?
Yes.

[shouting]
And he didn't fool you for one minute?
I knew who he was. I wanted to see how far he would go.
Mon blooming dieu. He couldn't have gone very much further could he?
Oh, I don't know. We've still got the guillotine!
[first lines]

Paris, 1789. The Great Revolution has begun. The hands of the masses are smeared with the blood of the poor bleeding aristocracy. Every day the tumbrels run a regular half-hour service between the Bastille and the many guillotines around the city. The growing mounds of noble heads are only matched by the growing mounds of unused return tickets. No-one is spared. Madame La Guillotine claims them all. Dukes and Duchesses, Lords and Ladies, men and women of both sexes. A dozen times an hour the drums roll, the blade falls, and the heads roll. Yes, every five minutes, a freshly sliced loaf.
[Drinks Champagne and belches loudly]
Ooh! Charming!
Well I can't 'elp it. It's the bubbles; they get lodged in me chest.
Yes. There's room for a few lodgers in there.
I would do anything for you. Anything. Your wish is my command; and your desire is my desire.
Really?
Hmm-mm.
Methinks, if I play my cards right, I might be on to a good thing here.
Have either of you ever seen a man looking like that?
Well, it's marvelous what you can do with a bit of padding. If I could just have a bit of a prod...
No you cannot have a bit of a prod! Imbecile! Admit it. This Fingernail has made a monkey of you, yet again.
Excuse me, my dear. May I cut in?
Of course Rodney.
I'm Camembert! I'm the big cheese!
Come, my dear, let's take a walk in the arbour.
Blaimy! I didn't know we were so near the sea.
Remember you must be circumspect.
Oh, I was Sir. When I was a baby.
[last lines]
Nice way to keep a bargain, I must say.
What's the matter with you? I promised you a title and he's got one.
Hate to think what it is.
[laughs]

[the Duc is about to be guillotined]
Your Grace, there's an urgent letter for you.
Oh, drop it in the basket, I'll read it later.
